app_concept.name: WarrantyVault
app_concept.tagline: Never lose a warranty claim again
app_concept.core_value_proposition: Protect your purchases by tracking warranty expiration dates with timely reminders and organized documentation for claims

pain_points: Unable to prove purchase date for claims
Disorganized documentation across filing cabinets and emails
goals: Never miss a warranty claim opportunity
Quickly access documentation when something breaks
Know at a glance what's still under warranty
primary.demographics: Adults 30-55, homeowners, household income $60K+, multiple appliances and electronics

pain_points: Frequent moves make tracking documents difficult
No centralized place for digital receipts

mvp_features.name: Quick Add Item
mvp_features.description: Add new items with photo of receipt, product name, purchase date, warranty period, and optional product photo
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to quickly add a new purchase so I can start tracking its warranty immediately
acceptance_criteria: Manual entry fields for product details

mvp_features.name: Warranty Dashboard
mvp_features.description: Home screen showing all items organized by warranty status: active, expiring soon, expired
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to see all my warranties at a glance so I can quickly identify what needs attention
acceptance_criteria: Section for items expiring within 30 days

mvp_features.name: Expiration Alerts
mvp_features.description: Push notifications reminding users before warranty expires
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to be reminded before my warranty expires so I can make claims or extend coverage
acceptance_criteria: Push notification with item name and days remaining
In-app notification center for missed alerts

mvp_features.name: Item Detail View
mvp_features.description: Full details for each item including photos, documents, warranty countdown, and claim status
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to see all details about an item so I can access everything needed for a warranty claim

mvp_features.name: Category Organization
mvp_features.description: Organize items by category: Electronics, Appliances, Furniture, Vehicles, Other
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want to organize items by category so I can quickly find related items

mvp_features.name: Local Data Storage
mvp_features.description: All data stored locally on device for offline access and privacy
mvp_features.user_story: As a user, I want my data stored locally so I can access it offline and maintain privacy
acceptance_criteria: No account required for core features

premium_features.name: Cloud Backup & Sync
premium_features.description: Secure cloud backup with cross-device sync for premium subscribers
premium_features.justification: Protects against device loss and enables family sharing - high value for users with significant inventory

premium_features.name: Unlimited Items
premium_features.description: Free tier limited to 10 items; premium unlocks unlimited tracking
premium_features.justification: Typical household has 20+ warrantied items; limit creates natural upgrade trigger

premium_features.name: Insurance Export
premium_features.description: Generate formatted PDF report suitable for insurance claims
premium_features.justification: High-value feature for disaster recovery; users actively seek this capability

premium_features.name: Manual/Document Storage
premium_features.description: Attach multiple documents per item including manuals, receipts, extended warranty certificates
premium_features.justification: Centralizes all product documentation; natural extension of core value

premium_features.name: Custom Categories & Tags
premium_features.description: Create custom categories and add tags for flexible organization
premium_features.justification: Power user feature for those with large inventories

direct_competitors.name: Under My Roof
direct_competitors.differentiation: WarrantyVault focuses specifically on warranty lifecycle vs general inventory

direct_competitors.name: MyItems
direct_competitors.differentiation: WarrantyVault offers configurable alerts and insurance-ready exports

direct_competitors.name: Nest Egg
direct_competitors.differentiation: WarrantyVault subscription enables continuous improvement and cloud sync

direct_competitors.name: Sortly
direct_competitors.differentiation: WarrantyVault is consumer-focused with accessible pricing

competitive_analysis.positioning: The warranty-focused tracker that's simple enough to actually use. Unlike broad home inventory apps, WarrantyVault does one thing well: making sure you never miss a warranty claim. Affordable subscription includes cloud backup and unlimited items.
